ValidationRule.description: Only a System Administrator can uncheck an Email Opt-Out
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED( Email_Opt_Out__c ), Email_Opt_Out__c = False, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",
$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator API",
$Profile.Name <> "Sales Data Steward" ,
$Profile.Name <> "Salesforce Support"
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** Only a System Administrator can uncheck an Email Opt-Out ***
